description:
Button roles are the next evolution of reaction roles, using buttons to apply roles instead of emojis.

You can create a message using Wynem that has buttons on it that users can click to add and remove roles from themselves.
There are multiple different types of button role that you can create.

rows: The user can add and remove "normal" roles as they wish
Once a user has applied a "binding" role, it cannot be removed
Users can only have one "unique" role from a button role message at a time

guides.name: Creating Button Roles
content: To start setting up your own button roles, first, run the e!buttonroles/serverconfig roles buttonroles command, and then click the button to start.

Next, a modal will appear, where you can enter the information for the first role.
Fill in this modal and then click submit. Only the first field is required.
You will then be given the option to add another role, or move on. Add any extra roles you may want, or skip this section.

Finally, you will be given a choice for the button role embed type. This decides how the button role message will look.
There are three options:

rows: Use the default button role embed, which is auto generated from the information provided for each button.
Create your own custom embed that can look however you want
Send no embed, the message be just the buttons on their own

content: For a guide on creating custom embeds, check out the Custom Embed feature.
You are finished! Your button roles have been created. Just click a button to recieve/remove the designated role!

guides.name: Removing Button Roles
content: To remove button roles, simply delete the button role message!
